definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: The Cable office was reluctant to translate the report.
sentences.chinese: 電報局不大願意發那份報告。

sentences.english: The outer door closed on Archer and he walked hastily away toward the telegraph office.
sentences.chinese: 外大門在阿切爾身後關上了，他急忙向電報局走去。

sentences.english: She went to the telegraph office in a hurry.
sentences.chinese: 她匆匆忙忙向電報局去了。

sentences.english: He caught a Telegraph Avenue car that was going to Berkeley.
sentences.chinese: 他搭了一部通向伯克利的電報局大街的班車。

definition: 38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
to whisper to one another's ear
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
(of a student) to work part-time (while continuing one's studies)/(of a delinquent) to be reformed through work and study
lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money/extremely wealthy/loaded
Ruyuan Yao Autonomous County in Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong
